responses.rationale: The segment describes the cause of disease spread, not economic data or metrics.
Reports numerical metric ('23 states') using standard verb 'shows'.
Reports numerical metric ('35,500 birds') using standard verb 'confirmed'.
The segment reports locations of cases, not specific numerical metrics or economic data.
Reports numerical metrics ('two more farms', '5.3 million hens and 88,000 turkeys') using standard verbs.
Reports numerical metrics ('about 22 million birds', '1.8 million broiler chickens', etc.) using standard verbs.
Reports numerical metrics ('about 13 million chickens and 305,000 turkeys') using standard verbs.
Reports numerical metric ('46 million chickens') using standard verb 'had'.
Reports numerical metric ('about 11.7 million turkeys annually') using standard verb 'raises'.
